# isEqual() function
<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@esdmr/assert/assert](./esdmr.assert.assert.md) &gt; [isEqual](./esdmr.assert.assert.isequal.md)


Asserts that the given value is strictly equal to the given expected value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isEqual<T>(value: T, expectedValue: T, detail?: string, ...args: unknown[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | T | Value to assert. |
|  expectedValue | T |  |
|  detail | string | Extra description. |
|  args | unknown\[\] | Format arguments. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
